verbs.description: The internet [V: is] hammering Donald Trump on Sunday after he fired off a tweet accusing former President Obama of knowing about Russian meddling in the 2016 election and not doing anything to stop it — despite reports that the Obama administration made multiple attempts to stave off interference from the Kremlin .
